modName: The Master Guide to FOMOD Installers
summary:
A PDF File containing all the instructions to writing FOMOD scripts using the XML system by Kaburke.
Guide by nyrb.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center][color=orange]Description[/color][/center][/size][line]
[center]A PDF file containing instructions to writing FOMOD scripts (installers) using the XML system by Kaburke.

The guide itself is provided as images and as a downloadable PDF file. If you want to spread the word please download and endorse.

All credits to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/1316898/?]nyrb[/url] for creating the guide and to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/648728/?]Kaburke[/url] for designing the XML system (we love you both!) Please take the time to go to the [url=http://is.gd/LFUyvU]original mod page[/url] and endorse it as well![/center]

[size=5][center][color=orange]F.A.Q.[/color][/center][/size][line]

[b][u]Q: Did you make this?[/u][/b]
[b][u]A:[/u][/b] NO.

[b][u]Q: Why did you upload this?[/u][/b]
[b][u]A:[/u][/b] To make it more visible to everyone out there, this has helped me and a few others immensely.

[b][u]Q: Why should I download when you have put up the images?[/u][/b]
[b][u]A:[/u][/b] Downloading and endorsing will make this more visible, which will make it reach and help more people. I have also put up the images as I hate when someone says something is amazing and doesn't show it. So, this way you can look at the images and decide if it worth dowloading :D
author: nyrb
